= Contributing Code =

We are happy to accept contributions to this project.

  # First, we must have a Contributor License Agreement (CLA) on file:
    * [http://code.google.com/legal/individual-cla-v1.0.html individuals]
    * [http://code.google.com/legal/corporate-cla-v1.0.html companies]
  # Please comment on an issue (creating one if it doesn't exist) that you are working on, so work isn't duplicated.
  # Prepare a patch, following the style of existing code (and including tests).
  # Post the patch to the [http://groups.google.com/group/pseudolocalization-tool pseudolocalization-tool] group.
